Thursday, May 20, 2021

Remote Meeting

I. Board of Zoning Appeal
The Board of Zoning Appeal will hold a Virtual Public Meeting, THURSDAY - MAY 20, 2021.
Members of the public can participate or view the meeting remotely using the Zoom Webinar link:
<https://cambridgema.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_NcNyR-ejToKfzmFibageZg>
Or join by phone: Dial +1 929 436 2866 or +1 301 715 8592 - Webinar ID: 843 1709 7972
The following case will be heard:
6:00 P.M. CASE: BZA-017326-2020
Original Hearing Date: 12/10/20

2072 MASS AVENUE
CC HRE 2072 MASS AVE TENANT LLC
C/O CAPSTONE COMMUNITIES LLC - JASON KORB & SEAN HOPE
Comprehensive Permit: To construct a new multi-family 100% affordable housing community with 49
residential rental units, ground floor commercial and building amenity space. The proposal includes an
eight (8) story building with three (3) accessible parking spaces and two (2) drop off spaces.

City of Cambridge
